verses.verse: There was<WH1961> also a lot<WH1486> for the tribe<WH4294> of Manasseh;<WH4519> for<WH3588> he<WH1931> was the firstborn<WH1060> of Joseph;<WH3130> to wit, for Machir<WH4353> the firstborn<WH1060> of Manasseh,<WH4519> the father<WH1> of Gilead:<WH1568> because<WH3588> he<WH1931> was<WH1961> a man<WH376> of war,<WH4421> therefore he had<WH1961> Gilead<WH1568> and Bashan.<WH1316>

There was<WH1961> also a lot for the rest<WH3498> of the children<WH1121> of Manasseh<WH4519> by their families;<WH4940> for the children<WH1121> of Abiezer,<WH44> and for the children<WH1121> of Helek,<WH2507> and for the children<WH1121> of Asriel,<WH844> and for the children<WH1121> of Shechem,<WH7928> and for the children<WH1121> of Hepher,<WH2660> and for the children<WH1121> of Shemida:<WH8061> these<WH428> were the male<WH2145> children<WH1121> of Manasseh<WH4519> the son<WH1121> of Joseph<WH3130> by their families.<WH4940>

But Zelophehad,<WH6765> the son<WH1121> of Hepher,<WH2660> the son<WH1121> of Gilead,<WH1568> the son<WH1121> of Machir,<WH4353> the son<WH1121> of Manasseh,<WH4519> had<WH1961> no<WH3808> sons,<WH1121> but<WH3588> <WH518> daughters:<WH1323> and these<WH428> are the names<WH8034> of his daughters,<WH1323> Mahlah,<WH4244> and Noah,<WH5270> Hoglah,<WH2295> Milcah,<WH4435> and Tirzah.<WH8656>

And they came near<WH7126> before<WH6440> Eleazar<WH499> the priest,<WH3548> and before<WH6440> Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun,<WH5126> and before<WH6440> the princes,<WH5387> saying,<WH559> The LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> <WH853> Moses<WH4872> to give<WH5414> us an inheritance<WH5159> among<WH8432> our brethren.<WH251> Therefore according<WH413> to the commandment<WH6310> of the LORD<WH3068> he gave<WH5414> them an inheritance<WH5159> among<WH8432> the brethren<WH251> of their father.<WH1>

And there fell<WH5307> ten<WH6235> portions<WH2256> to Manasseh,<WH4519> beside<WH905> the land<WH4480> <WH776> of Gilead<WH1568> and Bashan,<WH1316> which<WH834> were on the other side<WH5676> Jordan;<WH3383>

Because <WH3588> the daughters<WH1323> of Manasseh<WH4519> had an inheritance<WH5157> <WH5159> among<WH8432> his sons:<WH1121> and the rest<WH3498> of Manasseh's<WH4519> sons<WH1121> had<WH1961> the land<WH776> of Gilead.<WH1568>

And the coast<WH1366> of Manasseh<WH4519> was<WH1961> from Asher<WH4480> <WH836> to Michmethah,<WH4366> that<WH834> lieth before<WH5921> <WH6440> Shechem;<WH7927> and the border<WH1366> went along<WH1980> on<WH413> the right hand<WH3225> unto<WH413> the inhabitants<WH3427> of En-tappuah.<WH5887>
Now Manasseh<WH4519> had<WH1961> the land<WH776> of Tappuah:<WH8599> but Tappuah<WH8599> on<WH413> the border<WH1366> of Manasseh<WH4519> belonged to the children<WH1121> of Ephraim;<WH669>

And the coast<WH1366> descended<WH3381> unto the river<WH5158> Kanah,<WH7071> southward<WH5045> of the river:<WH5158> these<WH428> cities<WH5892> of Ephraim<WH669> are among<WH8432> the cities<WH5892> of Manasseh:<WH4519> the coast<WH1366> of Manasseh<WH4519> also was on the north side<WH4480> <WH6828> of the river,<WH5158> and the outgoings<WH8444> of it were<WH1961> at the sea: <WH3220>

Southward <WH5045> it was Ephraim's,<WH669> and northward<WH6828> it was Manasseh's,<WH4519> and the sea<WH3220> is<WH1961> his border;<WH1366> and they met together<WH6293> in Asher<WH836> on the north,<WH4480> <WH6828> and in Issachar<WH3485> on the east.<WH4480> <WH4217>

And Manasseh<WH4519> had<WH1961> in Issachar<WH3485> and in Asher<WH836> Beth-shean<WH1052> and her towns,<WH1323> and Ibleam<WH2991> and her towns,<WH1323> and the inhabitants<WH3427> of Dor<WH1756> and her towns,<WH1323> and the inhabitants<WH3427> of Endor<WH5874> and her towns,<WH1323> and the inhabitants<WH3427> of Taanach<WH8590> and her towns,<WH1323> and the inhabitants<WH3427> of Megiddo<WH4023> and her towns,<WH1323> even three<WH7969> countries.<WH5316>

Yet the children<WH1121> of Manasseh<WH4519> could<WH3201> not<WH3808> drive out<WH3423> the inhabitants of<WH853> those<WH428> cities;<WH5892> but the Canaanites<WH3669> would<WH2974> dwell<WH3427> in that<WH2088> land.<WH776>

Yet it came to pass,<WH1961> when<WH3588> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> were waxen strong,<WH2388> that they put<WH5414> <WH853> the Canaanites<WH3669> to tribute;<WH4522> but did not<WH3808> utterly drive them out.<WH3423> <WH3423>

And the children<WH1121> of Joseph<WH3130> spoke<WH1696> unto<WH854> <WH853> Joshua,<WH3091> saying,<WH559> Why<WH4069> hast thou given<WH5414> me but one<WH259> lot<WH1486> and one<WH259> portion<WH2256> to inherit,<WH5159> seeing I<WH589> am a great<WH7227> people,<WH5971> forasmuch<WH5704> as the LORD<WH3068> hath blessed<WH1288> me hitherto?<WH834> <WH5704> <WH3541>

And Joshua<WH3091> answered<WH559> <WH413> them, If<WH518> thou<WH859> be a great<WH7227> people,<WH5971> then get thee up<WH5927> to the wood<WH3293> country, and cut down<WH1254> for thyself there<WH8033> in the land<WH776> of the Perizzites<WH6522> and of the giants,<WH7497> if<WH3588> mount<WH2022> Ephraim<WH669> be too narrow<WH213> for thee.

And the children<WH1121> of Joseph<WH3130> said,<WH559> The hill<WH2022> is not<WH3808> enough<WH4672> for us: and all<WH3605> the Canaanites<WH3669> that dwell<WH3427> in the land<WH776> of the valley<WH6010> have chariots<WH7393> of iron,<WH1270> both they who<WH834> are of Beth-shean<WH1052> and her towns,<WH1323> and they who<WH834> are of the valley<WH6010> of Jezreel.<WH3157>

And Joshua<WH3091> spoke<WH559> unto<WH413> the house<WH1004> of Joseph,<WH3130> even to Ephraim<WH669> and to Manasseh,<WH4519> saying,<WH559> Thou<WH859> art a great<WH7227> people,<WH5971> and hast great<WH1419> power:<WH3581> thou shalt not<WH3808> have<WH1961> one<WH259> lot<WH1486> only:

But <WH3588> the mountain<WH2022> shall be<WH1961> thine; for<WH3588> it<WH1931> is a wood,<WH3293> and thou shalt cut it down:<WH1254> and the outgoings<WH8444> of it shall be<WH1931> thine: for<WH3588> thou shalt drive out<WH3423> <WH853> the Canaanites,<WH3669> though<WH3588> they have iron<WH1270> chariots,<WH7393> and though<WH3588> they<WH1931> be strong.<WH2389>
